title: Salesforce raises annual forecasts as AI software adoption picks up steam
description: The forecast signals that monetisation for the company's Agentforce platform is picking up pace as enterprises gravitate towards autonomous AI to streamline and automate repetitive and administrative tasks.
content: Salesforce raised its fiscal 2026 revenue and adjusted profit forecasts on Wednesday, anticipating growth in its artificial intelligence agent platform due to strong enterprise demand, sending its sh… [+1851 chars]
